Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 04 Mar 2019A hedge fund is an alternative investment that is designed to protect investment portfolios from market uncertainty, while generating positive returns in both up and down markets. Throughout time investors have looked for ways to maximize profits while minimizing risk.0 comments1
